---
title: Check Balance
description: "How to check a wallet account's balance."

  - get balance

---

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipFaucet from '../../_admonitions/_tip-faucet.md';

You can retrieve the balance for any [wallet you created](create-wallet.mdx) by calling the
[`Wallet.getBalance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#getbalance) function. Bear in mind that you should
always [`sync`](references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#sync) the [`Wallet`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md)
with the node to get the latest outputs. The sync function also returns the [`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance/).

<TipFaucet />

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html).
2. Sync the wallet with the node to get the latest transactions and the wallet's
   [Balance](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/types/balance/struct.Balance.html) by calling
   the [`Wallet.sync()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.sync)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/wallet/check_balance.rs#L31
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet).
2. Sync the wallet with the node to get the latest transactions and the wallet's
   [`Balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance/) by calling the
   [`Wallet.sync()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#sync)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/wallet/check-balance.ts#L27
```

</div>

3. After syncing, you can also retrieve the balance by calling [`wallet.getBalance()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#getbalance).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/wallet/check-balance.ts#L30
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html).
2. `Sync` the wallet with the node to get the latest transactions and the wallet's
   [`balance`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance/) by calling the
   [`Wallet.sync()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#sync)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/wallet/check_balance.py#L16
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

```plaintext
Balance {
    base_coin: BaseCoinBalance {
    total: 1398000000,
    available: 1398000000,
    },
    required_storage_deposit: RequiredStorageDeposit {
    alias: 0,
    basic: 213000,
    foundry: 0,
    nft: 0,
    },
    native_tokens: [],
    nfts: [],
    aliases: [],
    foundries: [],
    potentially_locked_outputs: {},
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

```plaintext
Balance {
    baseCoin: {total: '1398000000', available: '1398000000', votingPower: '0'
    },
    requiredStorageDeposit: {
    alias: '0',
    basic: '213000',
    foundry: '0',
    nft: '0'
    },
    nativeTokens: [],
    nfts: [],
    aliases: [],
    foundries: [],
    potentiallyLockedOutputs: {}
}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

```plaintext
Balance {
    "baseCoin": {
    "total": "1398000000",
    "available": "1398000000"
    },
    "requiredStorageDeposit": {
    "alias": "0",
    "basic": "213000",
    "foundry": "0",
    "nft": "0"
    },
    "nativeTokens": [],
    "nfts": [],
    "aliases": [],
    "foundries": [],
    "potentiallyLockedOutputs": {}
}
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
